actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to establish a Standing Committee on Energy in the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes a Standing Committee on Energy in the House of Representatives, to be composed of twenty-five members. Directs the Committee to conduct studies on the development, application and control of all forms of energy and power in order to establish a coordinated energy program in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Standing Committee on Energy in the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.
